arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Valencia: Confirmed Starting Lineup Announced for La Liga Clash
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso's team could move to eight points in front of Barcelona with a win, as they play tomorrow. He indeed sticks with Fede Valverde at right-back, with Trent likely getting second-half minutes.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid possible starting lineup against Valencia in La Liga
arts.sum: Therefore, the starting eleven Alonso is set to field against Valencia will be: Courtois; Valverde, Militao, Huijsen, Carreras; Tchouameni, Güler; Mastantuono, Bellingham, Vinicius; and Mbappé. The biggest question about Xabi’s lineup for the Valencia match has already been answered by the manager himself: “ Vini won’t face any repercussions.”

arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Valencia: Predicted Lineup for the La Liga Clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Xabi Alonso could rotate the team that beat Barcelona in the El Clasico for the game against Valencia on November 1. RB: Trent Alexandr-Arnold - The injury to Dani Carvajal means Trent should start at right-back.
